testcase.name: Add a menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" a description "description" and price 15.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then A menu item with the name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added...........passed Given I have a menu item with name "Cucumber Sandwich" a description "description" and price 20.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then A menu item with the name "Cucumber Sandwich" should be added..........passed

testcase.name: Add another menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" a description "description" and price 15.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then A menu item with the name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added...........passed Given I have a menu item with name "Cucumber Salad" a description "description" and price 15.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then A menu item with the name "Cucumber Salad" should be added.............passed

testcase.name: Add third menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" a description "description" and price 15.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then A menu item with the name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added...........passed Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" a description "description" and price 15.passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then I should see an error message with value "Duplicate item"..............passed
